VoidUI_IB_remove_empty_desc:
Should we hide all custom infoboxes
that displays a 0 value?
VoidUI_IB_jokers_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for Jokers?
VoidUI_IB_jokers_kills_desc: Should we display how many lives Joker has taken out?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for Sentry Guns?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_kills_desc: Should we display how many lives Sentry gun has taken out?
VoidUI_IB_timers_desc: Should we display timers like Drills, saws etc.?
VoidUI_IB_civs_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Civies on the map?
VoidUI_IB_enemies_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Enemies on the map?
VoidUI_IB_gage_packs_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Gage Packages on the map?
VoidUI_IB_kills_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of lives taken out by you?
VoidUI_IB_lootbags_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of bags on the map?
VoidUI_IB_debug_desc: Settings that can help you gain some more information for reporting issues etc.
VoidUI_IB_debug_show_missing_id_desc:
If you enable this option, mod will print on chat (visible only to you)
missing ID for unit interactions
VoidUI_IB_debug_timer_desc:
Should mod print on chat (visible only to you)
timer ID that was just created?
VoidUI_IB_timer_Water_pump_desc: This timer is used in The Bomb: Forest
VoidUI_IB_timer_Water_desc: This timer is used in Counterfeit and Golden Grin Casino
VoidUI_IB_timer_Ink_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Paper_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Printer_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Helicopter_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 2
VoidUI_IB_timer_Barcode_scanner_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 1
VoidUI_IB_timer_Breaching_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 1
VoidUI_IB_timer_Tape_loop_desc: Should we display security camera loop timer?
VoidUI_IB_timer_Fuel_desc:
Should we display this timer? 
Currently used on Beneath the Mountain and Alaskan Deal
VoidUI_IB_special_kills_infobox_desc: Adds a kill counter for Special Enemies
VoidUI_IB_debug_jokers_desc: Will print some info about jokers on chat
VoidUI_IB_special_enemies_infobox_desc:
Should we add Special Enemies infobox? 
When both Special Enemies and Enemies infoboxes are turned on, 
enemies infobox will display amount of non-special enemies.
VoidUI_IB_ShowOnlyOwnedSentry_desc: With that option enabled, mod will track only your own Sentry Guns.
VoidUI_IB_ShowOnlyOwnedJokers_desc: With that option enabled, mod will track only your own Joker minions.
VoidUI_IB_row_size_desc: How many infoboxes should be in one row.
VoidUI_IB_timer_row_size_desc: How many timers should be in one row.
VoidUI_IB_joker_health_type_desc: How you want mod to display Joker health as?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_health_type_desc: How you want mod to display Sentry health as?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_ammo_type_desc: How you want mod to display Sentry ammo as?
VoidUI_IB_collectables_desc:
Count collectables in infobox? You can toggle on/off which one you want to display.
Empty ones (x0) will be removed regardless of the option 'Remove Empty'
VoidUI_IB_collectables_priority_desc: Used for sorting. The lowest priority will be displayed above the higher priorities (I know it's inverted priority system but whatever)
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Money_desc: Should we count all small moneys bundles and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Keycard_desc: Should we count all keycards and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Planks_desc: Should we count all planks and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_MuriaticAcid_desc: Should we count all muriatic acids and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_HydrogenChloride_d: Should we count all hydrogen chlorines and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_CausticSoda_desc: Should we count all caustic sodas and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Crowbar_desc: Should we count all crowbars and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Jewellery_desc: Should we count all Jewellery and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Ink_desc: Should we count all Inks and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Paper_desc: Should we count all Papers and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_BlowTorch_desc: Should we count all Blow Torches and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Thermite_desc: Should we count all Thermites and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_row_one_only_one_priority_titl: Only Highest priority next to original VoidUI boxes
VoidUI_IB_row_one_only_one_priority_desc:
With this setting enabled, it will put only Highest priority boxes near VoidUI's original boxes. 
Lower priorities will be displayed below them. 
With this option disabled even lower priorities will be placed near the VoidUI's original boxes.
NOTE: This setting gets overwritten by 'Vanilla boxes always above custom Infoboxes'
VoidUI_IB_row_one_for_vanilla_title: Vanilla boxes always above custom Infoboxes
VoidUI_IB_row_one_for_vanilla_desc: With this option turned on, no Infobox added with this mod will be placed at the same level as VoidUI's original infobox.
VoidUI_IB_p_one_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_two_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_three_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_four_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_five_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_six_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_debug_lootbags_desc: If enabled will print carry_id and unit_id in chat for each bag added to the Infobox
